chapters.title: Chapter 22:  One Answer
chapters.info: Pedra, p. 520 (628)—Short, serious-faced Accepted. She guided Egwene to her room on her first day in Tar Valon. She is a short, wiry woman, slightly older than Nynaeve. She seemed unpromising at first, but now Pevara thinks she will be raised to the shawl soon.
